nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy

Class PacManhattanAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy.PacmanStrategy
      • nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy.AIStrategy
        • nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy.PacManhattanAI

  • public class PacManhattanAI
extends AIStrategy
    This class implements a strategy to clean the board and avoid the ghosts with AI.

      • bfsNearestSafetyPelletSquare

        public Square bfsNearestSafetyPelletSquare()
        Search the nearest safe square where there is a pellet on the board. The search used is the Breadth First Search.
        Returns:
        the nearest safe square where there is a pellet, null if no safe pellet found.

      • convertPathToDirection

        public java.util.Deque<Direction> convertPathToDirection(java.util.List<Square> squaresList)
        Convert a square's list to know which direction the player must follow to get the nearest safe square.
        Parameters:
        squaresList - the square's list determining the path.
        Returns:
        a queue with each direction at each step.

      • bfsNearestSafetySquare

        public Square bfsNearestSafetySquare()
        Compute a BFS to know the nearest safety square.
        Returns:
        the nearest safety square, null if there isn't.
